attributes.action: Stop BBC to address Jammu and Kashmir as India Administered Kashmir
attributes.additional_details: The Instrument of Accession with India signed by Hari Singh was exactly the same as signed by all the other princely states of India to become a part of the Dominion of India and now internationally recognised as part of India. Hence the same should be with the state of Jammu and Kashmir.
attributes.background: At the time of partition of India in August 1947 the ruler of Jammu & Kashmir Hari Singh decided not to accede to either India or Pakistan. However when in October 1947 Pakistan attacked J&K Hari Singh signed the Instrument of Accession with India which was the same as signed by all Indian states.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for the BBC. You can find out how to complain to the BBC here:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/complaints/
